Team Schedule and Results

team_schedule.Rd

Returns a dataframe of the team's schedule and results. Additional information includes: (1) site and (2) cumulative record

team_schedule(team_id, year, sport)

Arguments

team_id

Team ID from team_mapping
year

Actual Year (example: 2016 or 2015)
sport

Tradiational Sport Name or Sport Code

Examples

team_schedule(697,2016,"MBB")
#>         team       Date                                           Opponent
#> 1  Texas A&M 11/13/2015                                        USC Upstate
#> 2  Texas A&M 11/16/2015                                   Southeastern La.
